title: cant connect to login queue whats going on
body: everytime i hit login it says cant connect to login queue anyone, else having this problem?... server status says everything is online

replies.body:
I had it about an hour ago, but i have been able to get in since then.

Server status said online even when it wasn't working.
So this happened to me for the first time, and after a little persistence with constantly closing the launcher and reopening it, it finally allowed me to log in.

same its back.... this is getting annoying
 
whats causing this its not servers down or my internet

gonna run a full repair will update with the results to see if it fix's it

hey cheesy we r friends but to wots happening if is still happening try restarting lol and/or your computer and check your wifi at the motom other wise if everything is fine then just wait or send an email to riot games
its all good now it was a server problem
I had this issue, and it just started working again. Took a while to complete the login now though. Try again?
Also, Riot has now updated their status page showing this issue: http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce
just saw that. ranked queues disabled... now i dont even need to login kek
This is giving me cancer omfg
tell me about it i had the same problem yesterday gave it an hour and it went away now i sit down keen for some games and its back again
I have it as well, has anyone found a solution?
